locations: Blackpool Tower Ballroom, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK
imdb.plot outline: Celebrating the recent resurgence in the popularity of dancing, the concept behind these shorts is simple but captivating - take professional Ballroom and Latin dancers, give them a variety of spectacular dances to perform and film them at stunning locations instead of a TV studio. The result is a music-based series of the most popular 12 dances in the world, shot in original HD in amazing locations and performed with great artistry. The programmes can be supplied as music and picture only, or with brief captions explaining some of the technique, origin and history of each featured dance. Episode: Paso Doble, Waltz, Jive, Quickstep, Rumba, Foxtrot, Samba, Tango, Mambo, Amercian Smooth, Cha Cha Cha, Viennese Waltz
imdb.title: Let's Dance
plot: A musical exhibition and journey into 12 Ballroom and Latin Dances.::Anonymous

Celebrating the recent resurgence in the popularity of dancing, the concept behind these shorts is simple but captivating - take professional Ballroom and Latin dancers, give them a variety of spectacular dances to perform and film them at stunning locations instead of a TV studio. The result is a music-based series of the most popular 12 dances in the world, shot in original HD in amazing locations and performed with great artistry. The programmes can be supplied as music and picture only, or with brief captions explaining some of the technique, origin and history of each featured dance. Episode: Paso Doble, Waltz, Jive, Quickstep, Rumba, Foxtrot, Samba, Tango, Mambo, Amercian Smooth, Cha Cha Cha, Viennese Waltz::BBC Motion Gallery
